name: part_005
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal, Akami Karubi, Amasugi Pururu, and Zuzu performing the song 'Ikenai Taiyou' on stage.
MC segment where Aki Rosenthal introduces the guests.

subtitles.original: ABC 続かない そんなんじゃダメじゃない
subtitles.english: ABC, it doesn't continue, isn't that no good?

subtitles.original: だってココロの奥は違うじゃない
subtitles.english: Because deep inside the heart, it's different, right?

subtitles.original: オレの青春そんなもんじゃない
subtitles.english: My youth isn't something like that.

subtitles.original: 熱く奥で果てたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to finish hotly deep inside.

subtitles.original: きっとキミじゃなきゃヤダよ
subtitles.english: Surely, I don't want anyone but you.

subtitles.original: オレはイケナイ太陽
subtitles.english: I am a naughty sun.

subtitles.original: Na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na...

subtitles.original: 赤い糸なんて絵空事
subtitles.english: The red string of fate is just a pipe dream.

subtitles.original: でも下心でさえ信じたいの
subtitles.english: But I want to believe even in ulterior motives.

subtitles.original: オレは正しい キミも正しい
subtitles.english: I am right, and you are right too.

subtitles.original: とにかくもう左右されないぜ
subtitles.english: Anyway, I won't be swayed anymore.

subtitles.original: 騙し騙され胸疼く
subtitles.english: Deceiving and being deceived, my chest aches.

subtitles.original: 下芝居が夜盛り上げる
subtitles.english: Cheap tricks liven up the night.

subtitles.original: 息が耳に触れた二人 Ah...
subtitles.english: Breath touched the ear, the two of us, ah...

subtitles.original: ABC 続かない そんなんじゃダメじゃない
subtitles.english: ABC, it doesn't continue, isn't that no good?

subtitles.original: だってココロの奥は違うじゃない
subtitles.english: Because deep inside the heart, it's different, right?

subtitles.original: 私の青春そんなもんじゃない
subtitles.english: My youth isn't something like that.

subtitles.original: 熱く奥で果てたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to finish hotly deep inside.

subtitles.original: きっとキミじゃなきゃヤダよ
subtitles.english: Surely, I don't want anyone but you.

subtitles.original: 私イケナイ太陽
subtitles.english: I am a naughty sun.

subtitles.original: 交わす言葉の記憶遠く
subtitles.english: The memories of exchanged words are distant.

subtitles.original: 口元の動きに揺れる
subtitles.english: Swaying to the movement of the lips.

subtitles.original: 濡れた髪を撫でた そして Ah...
subtitles.english: Stroked the wet hair, and then, ah...

subtitles.original: ABC 続かない そんなんじゃダメじゃない
subtitles.english: ABC, it doesn't continue, isn't that no good?

subtitles.original: だってココロの奥は違うじゃない
subtitles.english: Because deep inside the heart, it's different, right?

subtitles.original: オレの青春そんなもんじゃない
subtitles.english: My youth isn't something like that.

subtitles.original: 熱く奥で果てたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to finish hotly deep inside.

subtitles.original: きっとキミじゃなきゃヤダよ
subtitles.english: Surely, I don't want anyone but you.

subtitles.original: オレはイケナイ太陽
subtitles.english: I am a naughty sun.

subtitles.original: 絡み合う糸はキミと
subtitles.english: The intertwining thread is with you...

subtitles.original: オレを結ぶ赤い糸
subtitles.english: ...the red thread that ties me.

subtitles.original: Na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na...

subtitles.original: はぁ…はぁ…
subtitles.english: (Panting)

subtitles.original: みんな！来てくれてありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thanks for coming!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ということで お友達が来てくれたので せっかくなので自己紹介してもらおうと思います！
subtitles.english: So, since my friends are here, I'd like them to introduce themselves!

subtitles.original: まずは ぷるるちんから！
subtitles.english: First up, Pururu-chin!

subtitles.original: はーい！天使と悪魔のハーフ プルプルエンジェルデビル 天杉ぷるるです！
subtitles.english: Hi! Half Angel, Half Devil, Puru-Puru Angel Devil, I'm Amasugi Pururu!

subtitles.original: ぷるるだよー！おはぷるー！
subtitles.english: It's Pururu! Ohapuru!

subtitles.original: アキパイセン お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Aki-paisen, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: いやー とっても楽しかったねー！
subtitles.english: Man, that was so much fun!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: そして続いて かるびちゃん！
subtitles.english: And next up, Karubi-chan!

subtitles.original: はーい！お肉の国のお姫様 赤見かるびです！
subtitles.english: Hi! Princess of the Meat Kingdom, I'm Akami Karubi!

subtitles.original: アキロゼ 誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: AkiRose, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: いいね ライブって 友達とライブ初めてだからさ マジで嬉しかったよ
subtitles.english: Live shows are great. It's my first time doing a live with friends, so I was really happy.

subtitles.original: ありがとう呼んでくれて
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting me.

subtitles.original: またやろうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's do it again!

subtitles.original: またやろう！
subtitles.english: Let's do it!

subtitles.original: そして最後に ずずさん！
subtitles.english: And finally, Zuzu-san!

subtitles.original: はーい！僕のこと知らない人いると思うんで 自己紹介だけさせてください！
subtitles.english: Hi! I think some people don't know me, so let me just introduce myself!

subtitles.original: 雨降ってザーザー 少女時代はGee Gee
subtitles.english: Rain falls zaa-zaa, Girls' Generation goes Gee Gee!

subtitles.original: 俺の名前は ズズズズズ… ズズでございます！
subtitles.english: My name is Zu-Zu-Zu-Zu-Zu... I am Zuzu!

subtitles.original: いやー お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Man, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!
